common.statGrowthDesc: Upon victory or draw in a random Inis battle, one of your Inis's stats (Attack, Defense, Health, Recovery) will randomly increase by 1.
common.affectionImportanceDesc: The higher the affection with your Inis, the higher the chance your Inis will perform 'Attack!' in battle, and the lower the chance it will perform 'Not listening to user!'
common.nearbyBattleDesc: Nearby Inis battles have no limit and no stat or affection rewards. Use them for practice battles.
common.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
common.walkDescription: Build affinity with your Inis by taking a walk. (Once a day)
common.conversationDescription: Build affinity with your Inis by talking to them. (3 times a day)

common.countryUpdateFailed: Name saved successfully, but failed to update country information.
